title: A Fool's Errand
description: Mani, like every young Dwarf his age, must complete a quest to be considered a man among his people. His goal is simple: travel across several hundred miles of dangerous terrain and retrieve a rare black crystal on a far away island.For Mani, this quest is more than just a rite of passage. Having been shunned by his people because of a mark left upon him by his murderous father, Mani has never known the feeling of love or friendship. If he returns with the crystal, he may finally clear his name and gain acceptance among his people.The action never stops in this epic tale as Mani, with the help of his newfound sorcery and a handful of companions, battles a host of vile creatures he encounters along the way. The more Mani sees of the world beyond his homeland, the more he realizes he has been sent on a foolâ€™s errand.
author: Kendall Karch
